text: Ani allahane tumacyasathi apalya granthata (pavitra kura'anata) ha adesa utaravila ahe ki jevha tumhi allahacya ayatinsi inkara ani thatta-maskari hota asalyace aikala tevha tyancyasobata tya baithakita basu naka joparyanta te dusarya gostivara bolata nahita karana tya veli tumhi tyancyasamana tharala. Nihsansaya allaha, munaphikanna ani inkari lokanna jahannamamadhye ekatra karanara ahe
